```py
>>> t

    ['Quednoe', 'Biggles', 39, 3.14]
```

```py
❶ >>> t[-1]

       3.14

❷ >>> t[0:2]

       ['Quednoe', 'Biggles']

❸ >>> t[1] = 'Melvin'

   >>> t

       ['Quednoe', 'Melvin', 39, 3.14]

❹ >>> t.index("Melvin")

       1
```
